name: Jumpy jump (rptk)
description:
the game goal is to reach the blue head    
you can jump from the floor or the walls, if you are jumping from the floor you can jump a second time in the air,  if you fall you loos :(
button:
arrows key: jump and move around
Q: quit
R: restart
this is a game I made for fun 
therefor there are some hidden option that are not described in the instruction
lastly I would like to know your thoughts of the game (i.e. bugs, improvements ...)
